评论概述: Great Look, Great Feel, Amazing Price
评论详情: This was recommended to me by a coworker.  They are so comfortable.  They feel like sneakers but look like dress shoes.  I wear them to business meeting and get compliments all the time. 评论概述: comfortable and not crowed in toe
评论详情: Got a pair for my brother in law and he liked them, so bought a pair for my husband for Christmas.  He usually wears a 13 and the 13 in these fit.  He liked them because they have a large toe box. Another pair of shoes that were over $300 in 13 he did not like because toe box was so narrow he would need to go up a half size to wear if at all. The sock ankle does not seem to be a rubbing problem. In fact it may make for less ankle rub because it is  soft.  The materials are not leather. They are vinyle or something. But a shoe that is vinyle and feels good and is inexpensive is better than the $300 pair of beautiful leather shoes I bought him that hurt and he can't wear them.  A comfort shoe that gets him out of tennis shoes is OK by me.

评论概述: Excellent shoe with one potential issue
评论详情: Attractive, well built, and very comfortable shoe.  So why did I return them?  I'm a bigger guy and when I tried them, the insole would compress enough to allow my heels to slip quite a bit in the back of the shoe.  I was concerned about this causing an issue on my heal.  If this isn't an issue for you, they're a simple recommendation.
